title: 820-00165 power button no worky
message:
Verified keyboard is dropping signal down correctly. Traced this down to see that signal drops at pin 1 resistor R5170 when jumpering the SMC_ONOFF to ground... but it isn't turning machine off or registering that the power button is being pushed. Everything else on this mac works...  boots and runs but the power button doesnt work. 

Just wanted to double check: anything besides the SMC that could override that signal? or just swap out the SMC?s

title: 820-00165 power button no worky
message:
PM_PWRBTN_L drops when you trigger SMC_ONOFF_L?
Machine turns off if pressed power button 4-5s?

title: 820-00165 power button no worky
message:
PM_PWRBTN_L didn't drop when triggering SMC_ONOFF_L Replaced SMC.
Power button works! Oddly I thought replacing SMC would also fix no light on charger but it did not.

Boots and runs normal from what I can tell but no charger light? Checking the boards. Tried changing the DCIN board... cable maybe?

title: 820-00165 power button no worky
message:
You forgot to post actual PPBUS_G3H voltage.
Also need SYS_ONEWIRE level.
You should try known good LIO flex/board.
Inspecy J9500 pins for corrosion too (19)...

title: 820-00165 power button no worky
message:
was the flex cable! Looks like everything is good booting. will make sure it's charging when back in its home. 

THANKS!
